forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain mixed with snow. Low -1C.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow. Lows overnight in the low 30s.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow this evening will give way to a mixture of rain and snow late. Low -1C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of precip 100%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow this evening will mix with rain at times late. Low 31F. E winds at 10 to 20 mph, decreasing to 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 100%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High near 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 41F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low -1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low 31F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High 4C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. High 39F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy during the evening. A few snow showers developing late. Low -2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with a few snow showers later at night. Low 29F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 30%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High near 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 41F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low -4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low near 25F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning followed by cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 38F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low -1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low 31F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning. The rain and snow will become lighter and change to all rain in the afternoon. High 3C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning. The rain and snow will become lighter and change to all rain in the afternoon. High 38F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with snow showers in the evening and steady snow likely after midnight. Low 1C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 70%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with snow showers in the evening and steady snow likely after midnight. Low 34F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 70%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the morning. The rain and snow will change to rain showers in the afternoon. High 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 70%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning. The rain and snow will change to rain showers in the afternoon. Temps nearly steady in the mid to upper 30s. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 70%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. Low -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low 29F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning then becoming cloudy with a mix of light rain and snow later in the day. High 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning then becoming cloudy with a mix of light rain and snow later in the day. High 36F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 30%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low -4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers. Low 24F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers in the morning will give way to a mixture of rain and snow in the afternoon. High 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers in the morning will give way to a mixture of rain and snow in the afternoon. High 34F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. Low -2C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. Low 28F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers that will mix with rain showers later. High 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 50%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers that will mix with rain showers later. High 34F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. Low -1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
